snippet: Upbeat factory data joined bullish employment and retail sales reports in suggesting strength in the economy, even as growth in the fourth quarter is expected to moderate sharply.
abstract: Federal Reserve reports factory production rose 1.1 percent in November after climbing 0.4 percent in October; overall industrial production rose 1.3 percent.
lead_paragraph: Upbeat factory data joined bullish employment and retail sales reports in suggesting strength in the economy, even as growth in the fourth quarter is expected to moderate sharply.

headline.main: Factory Output Higher Than Expected, Adding to Optimism
headline.print_headline: Factory Output Higher Than Expected, Adding to Optimism
